entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greenstone (Beardmore)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:49 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.9°C

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
